sentence.Network_en: She was graveled by her son's odd behavior.
sentence.Network_cn: 儿子古怪的行为令她困惑不已.
一夜之间,街道用砾石铺好了.

sentence.Network_en: This problem has graveled me for weeks.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个问题已经困扰我好几个星期了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: The streets were graveled overnight ., 一夜之间 , 街道用砾石铺好了.
